呢個係我睇bob叔之後再自己fine tune出黎既版本
你都可以上youtube搵返佢原版

所有料都可以係中超買到 除左洋蔥
柴魚粉/鰹魚粉（我用鰹魚）
萬字豉油
糖
米
洋蔥
打邊爐肥牛

做法：
1. 半個洋蔥切條 + 煮飯
2. 將柴魚粉/鰹魚粉兩包開2L熱水
3. 倒落pan
4. 落半個飯碗萬字豉油 +3茶匙糖
5. 攪暈佢等佢滾 試味 唔夠咸就多d豉油 唔夠甜就多d糖 依家個味應該係壽喜燒個湯底味 未係牛汁味
6. 水滾落洋蔥煮到好淋 再好似打邊爐咁淥熟d肥牛 咁個味就會好神奇咁變左牛丼味
7. 食

You will need Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR) before getting British Citizenship. You can get ILR by the follow ways -

讀書 - Long Residence - 10 years in the UK.

做野 - Tier 2 (General) - 5 years in the UK.

結婚 - Spouse visa - 5 years in the UK.

If you plan to get ILR by 讀書 or 做野 and you hold a BN(O) passport, I would suggest that you should get your UK visa using your BN(O) passport.

David憶述，源於幾年前一次聚餐時偶遇英國陸軍音樂總監，對方提起英國御林軍樂隊招募新隊員，他持有英國國民海外護照（BNO）身份也可參與招聘考試，故決定一試。軍樂隊考試分兩部分，體能為先，音樂第二。對於當年三十三歲的他來說，體能測試是極大的挑戰，首輪面試便因跑步不達標而失敗。但他並沒有放棄，返港苦操三、四個月後，二○一三年通過所有測試，成功取錄。

要成為正式御林軍，需接受長達半年基本訓練及音樂訓練，全天候廿四小時入住軍營及絕對服從命令。而David隸屬陸軍部隊軍樂隊Band of the Grenadier Guards，日常工作主要為白金漢宮每兩日一次換兵儀式伴奏，帶領新兵接替舊兵當值；軍樂隊亦在大型歡迎儀式演奏歡迎國家元首，他曾有幸接待國家主席習近平，又曾參與英女王壽辰的閱兵儀式等。他憑於軍隊的優秀表現及領導才能，入伍兩年後，即從單簧管樂手升為首席單簧管樂手。他現長居英國，還有一年可入籍，目標是繼續在軍隊攀升，成為終身職業。

A number of things for you to consider -

1) You can open an UK bank account in Hong Kong before moving over to the UK. Both the Bank of East Asia and HSBC offers this service.

2) You can exchange your Hong Kong driving licence to an UK one without test as long as you pass your driving test in Hong Kong.

3) If you are a British Citizen by descent (i.e. you were not born or naturalise in the UK), then your children born outside of the UK will not automatically get British Citizenship.

4) You will need to get a National Insurance number as soon as you are in the UK.

replies.msg:
為左想個bb 英國出世 - if your friend has British Citizen, I would suggest that he /she should get his/her baby born in Northern Ireland. By being born in Northern Ireland, the baby would also get Irish citizenship as he/she has a British Citizen parent. Having Irish citizen is useful after Brexit.

我老友有passport, 但英文屎又無技能 佢勝在乜都肯做 - He / she can work in a Chinese restaurant or a take away. There are more opportunities in the north as there are a lot more Chinese people in the south.

請問學費醫療是否免費? - Yes - unless you want to go private.

Your British Citizen friend needs to apply for his/her National Insurance (NI) number once he/she is in the UK -

https://www.gov.uk/apply-national-insurance-number

Please note that if the mother of the child is not a British Citizen, she may need to get a visa to come over and give birth in the UK and she will need to pay for the health care in order not to affect her chances of getting her UK settlement visa in the future.
